Producer: Masami Takahashi, Hiroyuki Ikeda, Hiroyuki Fujita, Isao Ito, Hiroyuki Ishigaki, Naoshi Fujikura, Katsuya Watanabe, Kokushi Miura, Akihito Watanabe, Takaaki Kabuto, Shuichi Kikuchi, Yoshihisa Heishi, Atsushi Igarashi
Synopsis: Six high schoolers stuck in a murderous time loop must find the scattered remains of an unknown victim to break the curse and finally see another day.
Title: Re/Member
